This comedic adventure follows a group of suburban biker wannabes as they hit the open road and encounter some unexpected challenges! Enjoy the ride!

Another great choice could be "The Skulls", a thrilling drama set at an Ivy League college where secrets and suspense intertwine. Paul Walker delivers a captivating performance in this film. Enjoy the ride!
